data.title: Great family style food
data.text: Went there with a group from work and great food. And the service was great. I definitely will stop back by the next time.

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Dean, we appreciate your review! See you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Dining Experince
data.text: While driving across town last time we were in Tulsa I kept seeing the signs for Ti Amos Ristorante...being a junkie for good Italian food we decided to give it a try.  So happy we did, the atmosphere was wonderful and the food exceptional.  The service was splendid and even got a table side visit from the owner.  We loved it, and will go back next time we are in town.  Try the Eggplant Parmesan, wonderful!

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello Kathy, Thank you for hunting us down and sharing your experience! We look forward to serving you again when you visit Tulsa.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent
data.text: On a Tuesday night it wasn't crowded.  Great selection yet the waiter made recommendations that were perfect. Portions were generous, staff was attentive, nice atmosphere. It's not a very large place, so I can imagine it can get loud if our when it's packed. The linguini pescatore was truly perfect, the bruchetta and lobster dip were excellent as was the lobster bisque.

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello, and thank you for your review! We appreciate you highlighting our seafood and sharing your experience.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Amazing all around!
data.text: The restaurant was cozy, dark and intimate. It was a little humid, but you had to walk down stairs from street level to get there. They serve bruschetta to the table (think chips and salsa Italian style), it was perfect! Our table ordered: ribeye steak, cajun linguini, shrimp scampi, and linguini pestatori. The rib eye was by far the best steak we've all tasted. The pastas were delicious, full of flavor and enough to stuff you and still have a plate full. The scampi were big full shrimp in a perfect sauce, not that oily buttery sauce you see at a lot of restaurants. We spent $136 for 4 people, that included appetizer, drinks and dinner. Will 100% go back!

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello Amanda, Thank you so much for dining with us and your detailed review! We look forward to seeing you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good place for a business meeting
data.text: They have a nice function room and provide good service on a 3 course menu with a choice of entrees.  The dessert was some kind of ice cream wrapped in cake.  That was the weakest part of the meal with the ice cream rather chalky.

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello, and thank you for sharing your business dining experience!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Birthday dinner
data.text: My husband took me to dinner for my birthday. We had a reservation on a Saturday night. We were promptly seated at a nice table against the wall, and our server was attentive without hovering. The food was delicious and better than I had planned.  They even caught that it was my birthday, and surprised me with a superbly elegant dessert. We had a lovely dinner.

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Jane, 

Thank you for sharing your birthday with us, and for your review! We are happy you thoroughly enjoyed your dining experience.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good Enough to Go Back
data.text: We found this restaurant the last time we were in Tulsa and sought it out again on this trip to see if it is as good as we remembered...we were not disappointed... it was much better than we remembered.  Overall, our  experience was excellent.  We enjoyed our food, the wait staff was friendly and attended our needs.  We recommend this restaurant and will go back again.

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Joseph,

Thank you for returning and your review! We are glad we were able to over-deliver on your expectations, and appreciate your recommendation.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: meh
data.text: went for a work birthday lunch. it was fine. sent my soup back, didn't care for my entree. okay wine selection & good service. love the ambiance but not worth the price.

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Lollie,

Thank you for your feedback. We do have some non-traditional appetizers and entrees from a typical Italian restaurant. We hope you'll give us another try, and will be glad to discuss options you might find more appealing.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good good, nice atmosphere
data.text: Love the brick basement location. Enjoyed the spicy Cajun pasta, the chicken was delicious, as well as the complimentary bruschetta and garlic cheese sticks. The lunch portion was huge, took half for another meal, so feel it was a very good value. The server was there every time needed. They provide meal cards that give one free meal after 5 paid. Will be back!

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello, Thank you for dining with us and your review! Our meals can be very filling. Thank you for highlighting our value and service, and we look forward to seeing you!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Filet Special Was Special
data.text: We were at The Mayo for a weekend getaway and decided to check trip advisor for restaurants nearby. We found Ti Amo Downtown, a short two blocks away The bruchetta comes with you meal and is the best we have had. We both ordered the filet special, and it was excellent. This restaurant just became our new favorite Italian restaurant in Tulsa. Recommend reservations.

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Jan,

We are so glad you found us and enjoyed your experience! The bruschetta is among our most-popular items, but we always like to hear just how much you like it. Thank you for your comments, and we look forward to seeing you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Italian at its best
data.text: We have eaten here and at their 61st & Sheridan location.  The food, ambience, and service is impeccable.  I highly recommend these restaurants.

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello, and thank you for dining at both our locations. We appreciate your review and recommendations!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Italian!
data.text: A bit pricey, but well worth the experience!  We tried to go back a second time, but time constraints wouldn't allow this!  Go here...you will not be disappointed!

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello, and thank you for dining with us and your recommendation! We hope to see you again soon when you have more time to enjoy the experience.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Delicious!
data.text: Everything was wonderful. The bruschetta was very fresh, caprese salad was great, no skimping on the cheese, and I had the chipotle chicken penne dish and was pleasantly surprised at how good it was. Perfect choice for an early dinner.

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello, 

Thank you for joining us and your kind comments! We're always glad to hear we delivered an exciting dining experience!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Veal Piccata is Divine
data.text: Everything on the menu here is outstanding. Start with the fresh bruschetta. My favorite entrée is the Veal Piccata. Prepared to perfection. The lasagna is also fantastic.

data.title: Wonderful
data.text: My mom, stepdad and I went here for my birthday dinner after we enjoyed it for my mom's birthday. The food is amazing. It is upscale and a wonderful atmosphere. Everything is perfection.

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello Ren, and thank you for sharing your special occasion with us! We love to be a part of special family moments, and appreciate your kind words.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Dinner did not disappoint
data.text: Atmosphere was nice, service was excellent! I have had better calamari but everything else was delish! We had a reservation and when we got there we were seated immediately and had a snack of bruschetta already on the table waiting for us.

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello, Thank you for dining with us and your review. We always strive for you to have an efficient experience, as well as delicious!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Super Hospitality and Fantastic Food!
data.text:
During a recent visit to Tulsa, our group arranged for Celebration Dinner. With such a large group they had set up homestyle servings and plenty of it. The food was superb, very authentic and flavorful. The servers were prompt and vigilant with our every need. They were friendly and courteous. To say I thoroughly enjoyed myself as did everyone who was in attendance would be an understatement. 
They served 3 different dishes.. Chicken Piccata, Baked Ziti, and a dish I am afraid I can not remember what it was called.. but... Mmmm good ..

owner_response.author: Van W, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Dawna,

Thank you for celebrating with us and reviewing your banquet experience. We work to have variety and attentiveness, to make sure everyone is satisfied. We appreciate the kind words, and please visit again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Simply outstanding
data.text: I was in town and met some friends here for dinner. We were seated promptly and our waiter Eddie greeted us straight away. I had the chicken parmigiana and it was some of the best I have ever had. It was accompanied by green beans and house salad before hand. The other parties had lasagna and shrimp ravioli and cleaned their plates. I highly recommend this place if you are hungry for good Italian food.

owner_response.author: VanTheWineMan, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for dining with us and highlighting several dishes. We appreciate your review and recommendations!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Never a Complaint
data.text:
Ti Amo Downtown is our go to place when we are in town. Food is always fabulous.
Atomsphere is perfect. Wait staff is exceptional.
Came here before a concert and they have a limited menu before concerts, but there was still plenty of options to choose from. We sat outside since inside was already full, but the weather was perfect so we enjoyed sitting outside. 
The waiter Eddie did a fabulous job juggling all the tables. 
We have never had anything but a great experience at Ti Amos downtown

owner_response.author: VanTheWineMan, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for being a regular, and sharing your pre-concert experience. We appreciate your review and recommendations!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wonderful Experience!
data.text: I love the Ti Amo in South Tulsa, and was excited to try the "new" downtown location. I was not disappointed. The Ti Amo in downtown Tulsa has a great ambiance and location. The food is excellent, the portions are very large, and it has a good wine list...not over the top...but, good. With the quality of the food, I think they should experiment with a more varied wine selection. My overall experience is that Ti Amo is a wonderful complement to the vast improvement, that is the new downtown Tulsa food experience.

owner_response.author: VanTheWineMan, Public Relations Manager at Ti Amo Ristorante Italiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for trying our downtown location and sharing your experience. We revisit our wine selections regularly, and hope you will find more to your liking. Thank you for your comments and recommendation!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
